title: GS Engineering & Construction 3Q Net Profit Rose 22% on Year
text:
By Kwanwoo Jun

GS Engineering & Construction Corp.'s (006360.SE) third-quarter net profit jumped 22% on year thanks to a recovery in its plant-construction segment, despite a setback in overall revenue growth.

Net profit was 168.00 billion Korean won ($143.4 million), compared with KRW137.29 billion in the same quarter a year earlier, the South Korean company said Monday. It beat a FactSet consensus forecast for net profit of KRW132.90 billion.

Revenue during the quarter fell 24% on year to KRW2.442 trillion.

Operating profit fell 20% on year to KRW187.69 billion.

Write to Kwanwoo Jun at kwanwoo.jun@wsj.com

(END) Dow Jones Newswires

October 28, 2019 04:14 ET (08:14 GMT)
